statements: UPDATE telecommunication_company_billing SET total_usage = 500.25, total_billing_amount = 100.50 WHERE customer_id = 123

UPDATE telecommunication_company_billing SET customer_name = 'New Customer Name', service_type = 'Business', total_billing_amount = 500.75 WHERE customer_id = 102;
